english: The educated guess is that he won ' t terminate the contract , but there ' s no definite way of knowing until july 2009
chinese: 有根据的猜测表明他不会结束合同，但是2009年7月之前是不会有明确的答案的。

english: Under secretary of state nicholas burns would not confirm media reports indicating the sales will total $ 20 billion , but he called that figure an educated guess
chinese: 副国务卿nicholasburns没有就媒体报道的销售总额200亿美元给与肯定答复，但他表示这一数额是“有根据的猜测” 。
有根据的猜测造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法
